personalInfo.titles: ðŸš€ Full Stack Developer | Cloud Enthusiast | Tech Explorer

about.description: Hi! I'm Salwyn, a passionate full stack developer and cloud enthusiast currently pursuing my B.Tech in Information Technology at KL University, Guntur (CGPA: 8.02, 2022-2026). I love building scalable web apps, exploring new tech, and solving real-world problems. My journey includes hands-on experience with modern frameworks, cloud platforms, and a drive to keep learning and innovating. When not coding, I enjoy photography, traveling, and experimenting with new recipes!

services.title: Full Stack Dev
services.description: End-to-end web application development using modern stacks like MERN, Django, and Next.js. I build scalable, high-performance web solutions.

services.title: Cloud Engineering
services.description: Designing secure, robust cloud architectures on AWS & GCP. Expertise in serverless computing, containerization, and DevOps pipelines.

services.title: Mobile Apps
services.description: Developing cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. efficient code and native-like performance for iOS and Android.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Creating intuitive, user-centric designs with a focus on aesthetics and detailed interaction flows to ensure a premium user experience.

experience.title: AICTE Remote Intern - Virtual Internships (Google)
details: Android Development (Cohort 8): Jetpack Compose, REST APIs, Kotlin, Android Studio, Git.
Cloud Engineering (Cohort 11): React.js, AWS, Node.js, Express.js, Git, REST APIs.

projects.title: Nimbus: Cloud-Powered Study Hub
description: Cloud-based academic platform for study resources.
Real-time doubt resolution, dark mode, feedback, secure account recovery.
Scalable backend with Firebase and AWS.

projects.title: PathFlow: Roadmap Manager
description: Built an interactive roadmap platform for creating and sharing personalized roadmaps with templates.
Real-time collaboration with WebSocket and scalable AWS backend.

projects.title: SkyBook: Airline Reservation System
description: Developed a full-stack flight booking platform for searching, booking, and managing reservations.
Admin features for managing schedules, seats, and ticketing.
RESTful API with Django and PostgreSQL for transactions.

projects.title: CanvasVerse: Online Art Gallery
description: Dynamic platform for artists and buyers to display, sell, bid, and discover artwork.
Scalable backend with MongoDB and Express.js.
Responsive React.js frontend for smooth browsing.

education.courses: Operating Systems, Data Structures, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Networking, Databases, Cloud Computing, Full Stack Web Development
